name: aa 300
description:
aa 300 is a super popular casual abuse Hearts game. The game screen is very simple! Simple interface coupled with a rotating sphere black and white, makes clear the purpose of the game! Games in the form of checkpoints, more to the later stages of the kind of feeling of vertigo, like bungee jumping!

Gameplay is simple, one-click! The beginning of the level, will be hung on the big ball small ball, you just put the ball underneath with numbers stuck on the big ball, small ball until sticky finish the game on the victory! If you are unfortunate enough to crash the ball next to the stick the ball in the process, then the game is over! With progressive levels, the sphere originally came with more and more, you need to glue small ball more and more, thus leading to the gap between the smaller and smaller, so you hit the ball the other chance increasingly high! Like the players may wish to see how much he can break off.
